subject: Verify end-to-end integration
description:
Run the full test suite across both packages and verify the dashboard works correctly with worktree stories.

**Steps:**
1. Run `cd packages/saga-utils && pnpm test` — all tests pass
2. Run `cd packages/dashboard && pnpm test` — all tests pass
3. Build the saga-utils package: `cd packages/saga-utils && pnpm build`
4. Build the dashboard: `cd packages/dashboard && pnpm build`
5. Verify no TypeScript errors
6. Verify biome lint passes: `pnpm biome check`
doneWhen: All tests pass across both packages. Both packages build successfully. Lint passes.
